text: Brian McKenzie may refer to: * Brian McKenzie (basketball) (born 1988), American basketball player * Brian McKenzie (ice hockey) (born 1951), retired Canadian ice hockey player * Brian McKenzie (footballer) (born 1947), former Australian rules footballer ==See also== * Brian Mackenzie, Baron Mackenzie of Framwellgate (born 1943), British Labour member of the House of Lords
title: Brian McKenzie
